writings.text: 非拘束名簿式比例代表制

readings.text: ひこうそくめいぼしきひれいだいひょうせい

furigana.writing: 非拘束名簿式比例代表制
furigana.reading: ひこうそくめいぼしきひれいだいひょうせい

glossary: proportional representation system in which both party and individual votes are cast, seats are distributed amongst parties by proportion of vote obtained, and candidates are elected in descending order of number of votes obtained
